name: CHOOSE A CUP
description:
This game was made for the Community Game Jam.

Watch the ball and choose the right cup, can you get it? I really doubt that.

This game was made in about 6:30 hours, so it's just so simple.

It's my first time joining a game jam, so I'm just not used to making games in a period with a specific theme, but it's still fun.    :)

Only one sound 'cause I'm really bad with making sounds and there was no time to learn.

Don't forget to rate my game and see my other games ;) ENJOY.
